name: roboclaude
description: Robotron 2084 clone built with React and Canvas

key_files.description: Main game component managing state and game loop

context.overview: A modern web-based clone of Robotron 2084 featuring smooth player movement, auto-shooting mechanics, wave-based enemy progression, and classic arcade-style gameplay.
context.architecture: React-based with HTML5 Canvas rendering, custom hooks for input handling, and modular component structure.
context.state_management: Uses React hooks (useState, useRef) with centralized state in Game.jsx component.
key_features: Dual-stick style controls (keyboard movement, mouse aiming)
